title: EKKO COSPLAY
body:
Hello League Community!

Just wanted to take the time to share my Ekko I did for Anime North in Toronto! I didn't have much time to work on it but I did the best I could lol! I will be adding to it and stuff later on to make it more complete but for now here it is! Hope you like it!

In one of the pics my friend cosplayed as Popstar Ahri so give him some love as well. 

Instagrams:
IamLordstark (me)
Markgogo (Ahri)

replies.body: This is awesome! Well done!

> [{quoted}](name=ZenonTheStoic,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-05-28T05:09:03.964+0000)
>
> This is awesome! Well done!

Omg omg omg thanks so much<333 :)!

Nice! :D
Totally love the Ahri cosplay too!
WOW good shit man. 9/10 just cus I don't give tens unless they make me shit my pants out of love
Thanks man xD! Yeah I totally understand haha!
DUDE, I WAS THE GUY THAT CAME UP TO YOU AND SAID I PLAYED YOU ON PBE!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Draven And Yasuo,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2015-06-06T18:51:19.905+0000)
>
> DUDE, I WAS THE GUY THAT CAME UP TO YOU AND SAID I PLAYED YOU ON PBE!!!

LOL! OMG! This might be late but yes! I still remember you xD! Awesome convo! plenty of nerfs on Ekko now xD!
From a fellow (much worse) cosplayer, well done!!
This is awesome! What did you use as his Z-Drive? How'd you make the prop!?

> [{quoted}](name=ShenWolf,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-05-28T13:17:25.695+0000)
>
> This is awesome! What did you use as his Z-Drive? How'd you make the prop!?

SUPER SORRY FOR THE LATE REPLY! Just figured out how to add pictures to the forum :/....Sorry sorry sorry! If its not to late check the end of the forum I just added some pics of the Z-Drive!

> [{quoted}](name=ShenWolf,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-05-28T13:17:25.695+0000)
>
> This is awesome! What did you use as his Z-Drive? How'd you make the prop!?

I'll edit the post and add a picture of it :D! I bought a cheap juice dispenser for the plastic part and surrounded it with foam and basically built it from there :)!
Ahri cosplay legit.
I haven't seen many cosplays in my life, but this is totally my favorite. I wish i had that sword.

> [{quoted}](name=eclipsekyd,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-05-28T00:55:55.136+0000)
>
> I haven't seen many cosplays in my life, but this is totally my favorite. I wish i had that sword.

Thanks so much! Theres plenty of awesome cosplayers out there! A lot better than I am too lol xD!
Would love a zoom-in on the Z-Drive thing, looks like that was well made too.

> [{quoted}](name=SquishyTentacles,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-27T21:19:25.888+0000)
>
> Would love a zoom-in on the Z-Drive thing, looks like that was well made too.

Hey! Super sorry for the late reply! But I've added some pictures in the forum in replies since it wouldn't let me add to my original post lol!! Go have a look :)!
This is sooo cool! What did you make the sword out of?

> [{quoted}](name=F1SH,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-05-31T00:39:45.881+0000)
>
> This is sooo cool! What did you make the sword out of?

SORRY FOR THE LATE REPLY! But I've explained how the sword was made in a couple comments and some have pictures! Go check them out :D!

> [{quoted}](name=F1SH,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-05-31T00:39:45.881+0000)
>
> This is sooo cool! What did you make the sword out of?

Foam board, foam, popsicle sticks, tape xD...LOL!

Amazing job!! I'm using your pictures as a reference for my cosplay. What did you use for the leather strap that held up your Z-Drive? I've looked into belts and handbag attachments but nothing seems to look as authentic. If you got it online could you post the link to where you purchased it?? TIA <3

> [{quoted}](name=ThePoroWrangler,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2015-07-24T02:37:06.472+0000)
>
> Amazing job!! I'm using your pictures as a reference for my cosplay. What did you use for the leather strap that held up your Z-Drive? I've looked into belts and handbag attachments but nothing seems to look as authentic. If you got it online could you post the link to where you purchased it?? TIA <3

HI! Thanks so much Tia! I'm so sorry for the late reply! I hardly check this lol and thought people stopped looking at it XD! For the leather strap I actually used a strap from a bag my girlfriend gave me (with her permission of course) LOL! I'll post a picture for you of a close up. The strap was meant to be comfortable to wear around all day so I didn't make it as thick as its suppose to be. I just kinda made it wearable and comfortable so it's literally just the strap. However, if you want to make it look more like his, you can add some foam to it to make it thicker :). 

In addition I drilled some holes and screwed the strap into the plastic part to keep it in place. Since you're going to be walking around a lot you don't want it to fall off right :)! 

Hope this helps! If you have any more questions let me know :)!

> [{quoted}](name=IamLordStark,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=00130000,timestamp=2015-08-15T06:09:43.950+0000)
>
> HI! Thanks so much Tia! I'm so sorry for the late reply! I hardly check this lol and thought people stopped looking at it XD! For the leather strap I actually used a strap from a bag my girlfriend gave me (with her permission of course) LOL! I'll post a picture for you of a close up. The strap was meant to be comfortable to wear around all day so I didn't make it as thick as its suppose to be. I just kinda made it wearable and comfortable so it's literally just the strap. However, if you want to make it look more like his, you can add some foam to it to make it thicker :).

> [{quoted}](name=IamLordStark,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=001300000000,timestamp=2015-08-15T06:10:05.686+0000)
>
>
Hey, sorry to necro this but how did you make the sword? Thinking of doing an ekko cosplay this year for New York Comic-Con

> [{quoted}](name=Ardroit,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-08-14T03:08:28.012+0000)
>
> Hey, sorry to necro this but how did you make the sword? Thinking of doing an ekko cosplay this year for New York Comic-Con

Hey! No worries lol! I basically used this guys method on youtube as a reference. But instead of using paper I used foam that you can get at like Wal-Mart or any dollar store :). The circle parts are literally tape roles covered in foam to disguise it lol. I'll try posting some more pictures in the comments below since its acting very strange...or I'm just stupid lol!

> [{quoted}](name=IamLordStark,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=00140000,timestamp=2015-08-15T05:56:32.867+0000)
>
> Hey! No worries lol! I basically used this guys method on youtube as a reference. But instead of using paper I used foam that you can get at like Wal-Mart or any dollar store :). The circle parts are literally tape roles covered in foam to disguise it lol. I'll try posting some more pictures in the comments below since its acting very strange...or I'm just stupid lol!

This is the layer of popsicles sticks it took to give it some weight and make it look more 3-D.

> [{quoted}](name=IamLordStark,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=001400000000,timestamp=2015-08-15T05:59:08.902+0000)
>
> This is the layer of popsicles sticks it took to give it some weight and make it look more 3-D.

This is the sword with the layers of foam on top of it. You'll have to cut it into squares to help make the gluing easier. Its hard to picture but when you follow the video you'll see him cut paper into squares to make it easier to handle. But instead of paper we're using foam :).

> [{quoted}](name=IamLordStark,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=0014000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-15T06:01:02.393+0000)
>
> This is the sword with the layers of foam on top of it. You'll have to cut it into squares to help make the gluing easier. Its hard to picture but when you follow the video you'll see him cut paper into squares to make it easier to handle. But instead of paper we're using foam :).

This is what the handle should look like with the tape rolls and the foam on top to create the texture and "metal" thing on the hilt of the blade.
Ahhh I saw you at Subway either the second or third day, and couldn't  stop staring!!! Love it.
ekko doesn't have black hair

> [{quoted}](name=TwoD,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=ByAxh6Oa,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-27T22:57:19.217+0000)
>
> ekko doesn't have black hair

Yeah I tried a white hairspray thing and it didn't really work out lol. Just gunna die it white next time xP!
eh still a pretty nice cosplay though
OH, I need to submit that weapon to AweMe

Would be really awesome to see there version! Seeing as it would actually be functional as a weapon lol!
All that's left are the nine tails!
Didn't lose any chocolate, just added vanilla.
